title: These folks wrote an autopilot in Javascript that can control planes in...
content:
These folks wrote an autopilot in Javascript that can control planes in Microsoft Flight Simulator 2020 (via the API). ‚ÄúTo allay any concerns: this is not about running JavaScript software to control an actual aircraft. That would kill people.‚Äù
